          <title>
            <string language="en">Dissolving a solute in a solvent at different temperatures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auflösen eines aufgelösten Stoffs in einem

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dissolution d'un corps dissous dans un dissolvant
aux différentes températures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dissolvendo um solute em um solvente em

            <string language="x-mt-it">Dissolvendo un soluto in un solvente alle

            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάλυση μιας διαλυτής ουσίας σε έναν διαλύτη στις

            <string language="x-mt-es">Disolver un solute en un solvente en diversas

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation of a solvent dissolving and diffusing into a solvent at hot and cold temperatures</string>

          <description>
